purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 莲)
Pictophonetic: 連 indicates the sound; 艹 (flower) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
蓮花 [ lián huā ]: lotus flower (Nelumbo nucifera Gaertn, among others); water-lily
蓮子 [ lián zǐ ]: lotus seed
蓮藕 [ lián ǒu ]: lotus root
蓮蓬 [ lián péng ]: lotus seed head
purpleculture_tree:

    • 艹 [ cǎo ] grass, weed, plant, herb
    • 連 [ lián ] to join, to connect; continuous; even
heisig_chinese_memo: Lotus flowers appear in groups so you'll see one after another.
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: You put flowers on your scooter and your car. The flowers you put on them are lotus flowers.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Imagine placing lotuses on top of your scooter and car. They are the right kind of flowers for these vehicles.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: You're putting a lotus on both your scooter and car because they are rentals (れん).
WaniKani_Reading_Info: You always put a lotus on top of your rental cars and scooters. Come up with a personal reason why you do this.
Ru_AutoNotes:
Известен под множеством научных и бытовых имён, в том числе как "лотос индийский". В японском чаще пишется катаканой – ハス, и даёт название роду Лотос (ハス科はすか). Всё растение съедобно и применяется в лекарственных и пищевых целях.

Цветок и листья лотоса орехоносного.
Ru_Notes: Фонетик: 連 (つらなる、レン выстраивать, вытягивать в цепь, вести, связывать).
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the grass (艹) you take with you (連) is lotus
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Lotus flowers appear in groups so you'll see one after another.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the sound of "艸", " lian ", the original meaning is lotus seed, and later refers to lotus. "Shuowen": "The truth of the lotus flower. From the foot, continuous sound." "Yuefu Poetry Collection-Xianghe Songs One. Jiangnan": "The south of the Yangtze River can pick lotus, and the lotus leaf is He Tiantian."

" Lian " can be used as a place name and a person's name, such as Lianshao County in the Han Dynasty, so its site is in the northeast of Weinan County, Shaanxi Province. "Han Shu·Xuan Di Ji": "I often trapped in the lotus sauce." Yan Shigu quoted as Chun, saying: "There is a salt pond in Lianshao County, which stretches for more than ten miles, and its native name is Luzhong."
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of "艸", " lian ", the original meaning is lotus seed, and then it means lotus.
humanum_full_description:
從「艸」，「連」聲，本義為蓮子，後指荷花。《說文》：「芙蕖之實也。从艸，連聲。」《樂府詩集‧相和歌辭一‧江南》：「江南可採蓮，蓮葉何田田。」

　　「蓮」可作地名、人名用字，如漢代之蓮勺縣，故址在今陝西省渭南縣東北。《漢書‧宣帝紀》：「常困於蓮勺鹵中。」顏師古注引如淳曰：「蓮勺縣有鹽池，縱廣十餘里，其鄉人名為鹵中。」
humanum_short_description: 從「艸」，「連」聲，本義為蓮子，後指荷花。

蓮蓮RS
莲莲 		lotus, water lily, (Buddhist) paradise
  • plant 艹 of which the roots and the seeds look like rolling wheels 連
(Simplified: 莲)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 連 indicates the sound; 艹 (flower) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿱ Above to below
    • 艹 [ cǎo ] grass, weed, plant, herb
    • 連 [ lián ] to join, to connect; continuous; even
①多年生草本植物，生淺水中。葉子大而圓。花大，有粉紅、白色兩種。種子稱“蓮子”，包在倒圓錐形的花托內，合稱“蓮蓬”。地下莖肥大而長，有節，稱“藕”。種子和地下莖均可食(亦稱“荷”、“芙蓉”、“芙蕖”、“菡萏”)：蓮藕。蓮房(ａ．蓮蓬；b．指僧人的居室)。蓮座(ａ．蓮花的底部；b．佛像的座位，由佛座多爲蓮花形而得名)。
蓮花 [ lián huā ]: lotus flower (Nelumbo nucifera Gaertn, among others); water-lily
蓮子 [ lián zǐ ]: lotus seed
蓮藕 [ lián ǒu ]: lotus root
蓮蓬 [ lián péng ]: lotus seed head

Chinese: Lotus flowers appear in groups so you'll see one after another.
Meaning: lotus
Hanzi: 莲
Story: Lotus flowers appear in groups so you'll see one after another.
Kind: traditional

從「 艸 」，「 連 」聲，本義為蓮子，後指荷花。《說文》：「芙蕖之實也。从艸，連聲。」《樂府詩集‧相和歌辭一‧江南》：「江南可採蓮，蓮葉何田田。」 「 蓮 」可作地名、人名用字，如漢代之蓮勺縣，故址在今陝西省渭南縣東北。《漢書‧宣帝紀》：「常困於蓮勺鹵中。」顏師古注引如淳曰：「蓮勺縣有鹽池，縱廣十餘里，其鄉人名為鹵中。」
From the sound of " 艸", " lian", the original meaning is lotus seed, and later refers to lotus. "Shuowen": "The truth of the lotus flower. From the foot, continuous sound." "Yuefu Poetry Collection-Xianghe Songs One. Jiangnan": "The south of the Yangtze River can pick lotus, and the lotus leaf is He Tiantian." " Lian" can be used as a place name and a person's name, such as Lianshao County in the Han Dynasty, so its site is in the northeast of Weinan County, Shaanxi Province. "Han Shu·Xuan Di Ji": "I often trapped in the lotus sauce." Yan Shigu quoted as Chun, saying: "There is a salt pond in Lianshao County, which stretches for more than ten miles, and its native name is Luzhong."

蓮字的基本解释

蓮
lián
见“莲”。

蓮字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lián］
［《廣韻》落賢切，平先，來。］
“莲1”的繁体字。亦作“苓2”。
即荷。也称芙蓉、芙蕖、菡萏等。多年生草本植物，生浅水中，地下茎肥大而长，有节。叶子圆形，花大，淡红色或白色。地下茎叫藕，种子叫莲子。藕可供食用或制藕粉，莲子为滋补食品，藕节、莲子、荷叶可供药用。
[②]［liǎn］
［《廣韻》力展切，上獮，來。］
“莲2”的繁体字。
地名用字。汉有莲勺县。故址在今陕西省渭南县东北。

蓮字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　蓮； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页1052第16
〔古文〕苓【唐韻】落賢切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】靈年切，?音連。【爾雅疏】北人以蓮爲荷。又【說文】芙蕖之實也。【爾雅·釋草】荷，芙蕖。其實蓮。【註】蓮謂房也。　又【集韻】連彥切，連去聲。【前漢·地理志】左馮翊蓮勺。【後漢·鄭興傳註】蓮勺，故城在今同州下邳縣東北。　又【字彙補】所夾切。草名。【廣雅】鳶尾、烏蓮，射干也。

lotus

lotus
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［lián］
["Guangyun" falls to Xianqie, level first, come. ]
Traditional characters for "莲1". Also known as "Ling 2".
That is the charge. Also known as hibiscus, lotus, 菡菏, etc. Perennial herb, growing in shallow water, the underground stem is large and long, with knots. The leaves are round, the flowers are large, light red or white. The underground stems are called lotus roots, and the seeds are called lotus seeds. The lotus root can be used for eating or making lotus root powder, the lotus seed is a nourishing food, and the lotus root joint, lotus seed and lotus leaf can be used for medicinal purposes.
[②]［liǎn］
["Guangyun" strives to cut, go up, come. ]
Traditional characters for "莲2".
Place names in words. There is Lianshao County in Han Dynasty. The former site was in the northeast of Weinan County, Shaanxi Province.
lotus

Also 【Said the text】Fuhua is the real thing. 【Erya·Shucao】Lotus, lotus flower. Actually Lian. [Note] Lotus is also a house.　[Jiyun] Lian Yanqie, and then sound. [Former Han Geography] Zuo Feng Yilian spoon. [Notes from the Later Han Dynasty·Zheng Xing Biography] Lianchao, the ancient city is in the northeast of Xiapi County, Tongzhou today.　 It is cut again by【Word Supplement】. Cursive name. Radicals: 艹, 車  (flowers, car, scooter)
Meaning Mnemonic
You put flowers on your scooter and your car. The flowers you put on them are lotus flowers.
Imagine placing lotuses on top of your scooter and car. They are the right kind of flowers for these vehicles.
Reading Mnemonic
You're putting a lotus on both your scooter and car because they are rentals (れん).
You always put a lotus on top of your rental cars and scooters. Come up with a personal reason why you do this.

込 (внутрь), 艾 (мокса), 車 (автомобиль)

Известен под множеством научных и бытовых имён, в том числе как "лотос индийский". В японском чаще пишется катаканой – ハス, и даёт название роду Лотос (ハス科はすか). Всё растение съедобно и применяется в лекарственных и пищевых целях.

Цветок и листья лотоса орехоносного.

Фонетик: 連 (つらなる、レン выстраивать, вытягивать в цепь, вести, связывать).
